title: Kyou mo Minna Genki desu
original_name: 今日もみんな元気です
sinopse:
Kana likes Tsukamoto, and maybe he likes her too. Some girls fight with boys, some don’t. But Kana and Tsukamoto each have a best friend, and their friends are fraternal twins, and perhaps the two of them can get together after all…

(Source: Animeraider)
